statements: SELECT * FROM user_interactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, product_id FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'click';
SELECT interaction_type, COUNT(*) AS count FROM user_interactions GROUP BY interaction_type;
SELECT * FROM user_interactions WHERE product_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT user_id, MAX(timestamp) AS latest_interaction FROM user_interactions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = 10 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type FROM user_interactions WHERE product_id = 20 AND interaction_type = 'like';
SELECT product_id, COUNT(*) AS interaction_count FROM user_interactions GROUP BY product_id HAVING interaction_count > 5 ORDER BY interaction_count DESC;
SELECT user_id, MAX(timestamp) AS last_interaction FROM user_interactions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, product_id, timestamp FROM user_interactions WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 23:59:59';
SELECT * FROM user_interactions ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'like';
SELECT user_id, interaction_type FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT recommendation_id, user_id, product_id FROM recommendations WHERE recommendation_type = 'recommended' LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, interaction_timestamp FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'click' ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM user_interactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_interactions > 5;
SELECT u.user_id, r.product_id, r.recommendation_type FROM user_interactions u INNER JOIN recommendations r ON u.user_id = r.user_id ORDER BY u.interaction_timestamp ASC;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT user_id) AS total_users FROM recommendations WHERE recommendation_type = 'personalized';
SELECT * FROM interactions;
SELECT interaction_id, user_id, product_id, timestamp FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'view';
SELECT user_id, username, email, location FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT product_name, price, category FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM interactions JOIN users ON interactions.user_id = users.user_id WHERE interactions.interaction_type = 'purchase';
SELECT * FROM interactions WHERE product_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, count(*) as interaction_count FROM interactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING interaction_count > 5;
SELECT username, email, location FROM users WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT product_name, price, category, brand FROM products WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT user_id, product_id, interaction_type, timestamp FROM interactions WHERE user_id = 101 AND interaction_type = 'like';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE gender = 'female' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT id, name, category, price FROM products WHERE price < 50.00 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT user_id, product_id, interaction_type, interaction_timestamp FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'viewed' LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, product_id, recommendation_score FROM recommendations WHERE recommendation_score > 3.5 ORDER BY recommendation_score DESC, recommendation_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE age > 30 AND age < 50 ORDER BY username ASC;

SELECT u.username, p.name, r.recommendation_score FROM users u JOIN recommendations r ON u.id = r.user_id JOIN products p ON r.product_id = p.id WHERE r.recommendation_score > 3.5 ORDER BY r.recommendation_timestamp DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_interactions, interaction_type FROM interactions GROUP BY interaction_type HAVING total_interactions > 100 ORDER BY total_interactions DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT category, COUNT(*) AS total_products FROM products GROUP BY category HAVING total_products > 5 ORDER BY total_products DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, timestamp FROM user_interactions WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT category_name, COUNT(*) FROM categories GROUP BY parent_category_id;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, timestamp FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_type='click' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE registration_date >= '2022-01-01' AND registration_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price < 100 ORDER BY category, product_name;
SELECT user_id, recommended_product_id, score FROM recommendations WHERE recommendation_method='collaborative_filtering' AND score > 0.8;
SELECT category_name, parent_category_id FROM categories WHERE parent_category_id IS NULL ORDER BY category_name ASC;
